text: @HouseGOP QUOTE FROM MCENANY "Absolutely, this president will always put America first, he will always protect American citizens," McEnany said. "We will not see diseases like the coronavirus come here, we will not see terrorism. COVID IS HERE AND THE TERRORISM IS COMING FROM THE WH
